whySlotsIdol.getSupportInnerText: Casino representatives are available 24/7 via email and live chat. We assist with registrations, deposits, withdraws and everything about SlotsIdol Casino!

slotsIdolBlock.heading: SlotsIdol
slotsIdolBlock.firstPar: Our fun and friendly online casino is bursting with exciting games, unbeatable offers, giant jackpots – and you can explore them all on our user-friendly, mobile adaptive site.
slotsIdolBlock.secondPar: Fancy a flutter as well as a spin? Head over to our Sports tab to take advantage of competitive odds on all your favourite sports. From football and horse racing, golf and boxing, to Virtual Sports and everything in between.
slotsIdolBlock.thirdPar: We pride ourselves on producing the smoothest products, whether you prefer to play from your computer or on-the-go via mobile, tablet or app. No matter what device you use, you’ll find hundreds of incredible games at CasinoCasinoCasino.com.

theFunStuf.heading: The Fun Stuf
theFunStuf.firstPar: What’s more, we believe in rewarding our players. As a thank you for choosing us, our unrivalled Loyalty Points scheme pays you to play! Spend enough time with us, and you could also become a VIP, living the casino highlife.
theFunStuf.secondPar: The Serious StuffNow on to the serious stuff – our parent company, Mansion Group Ltd., winners of Best Customer Service Company 2020 and Online Casino Operator of the Year 2018 at the International Gaming Awards, is an online casino heavyweight. With over 15 years of industry experience, Mansion boast an impressive portfolio of brands.

theSeriousStuff.heading: The Serious Stuff
theSeriousStuff.firstPar: Now on to the serious stuff – our parent company, ............Group Ltd., winners of Best Customer Service Company 2020 and Online Casino Operator of the Year 2018 at the International Gaming Awards, is an online casino heavyweight. With over 15 years of industry experience, ........... boast an impressive portfolio of brands.
theSeriousStuff.secondPar: When you play at ............com, you're guaranteed a fair, responsible and secure environment. We're licensed and regulated by the globally respected ............................both of whom are recognised for their stringent standards.
theSeriousStuff.thirdPar: Staffed by attentive and knowledgeable experts, our Customer Support team is here to make sure your time with us is hassle-free and as enjoyable as possible. Whether you need help with a big issue or a minor query, or even just fancy a chat – we’re available 24/7.

headers.textBottom:
If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions,
 please feel free to contact us anytime – we’re here to help you.

liveChat.heading: Live Chat
liveChat.textInfo: Our 24/7 Live Support service is always happy to help you.

email.heading: Email
email.textInfo: For customer queries, write to us at support@slotsidol.com. For other questions or offers, drop us a line at info@vivarobet.am and we will make sure the right person receives your email. Or use docs@slotsidol.com when sending us your documents.

question1.question: What happens if my deposit is not showing?
question1.text: If your crypto deposit is now showing, this most likely means that it has not yet been confirmed in the blockchain, or that your wallet has not yet sent the funds, you can always check the blockchain to see if your transfer is visible there, or ask the support if you need a hand with this.

question2.question: How long does it take for deposits for show in my account?
question2.text: If your crypto deposit is now showing, this most likely means that it has not yet been confirmed in the blockchain, or that your wallet has not yet sent the funds, you can always check the blockchain to see if your transfer is visible there, or ask the support if you need a hand with this.

whyUseBitcoinBlock.heading: Why use Bitcoin?
whyUseBitcoinBlock.infoText: We know it can be a little tricky to wrap your head around the virtual currency of Bitcoin. We think it’s the way forward in online payments and we want you to know why, so let’s break it down.

security.heading: Security and control over your money
security.textInfo: The state-of-the-art encryption that secures your Bitcoin transactions is used in government and military transactions, so you know it’s the safest around. As long as you take the required steps to ensure your wallet is protected, no one can ever get their hands on your money.

international.heading: FAST INTERNATIONAL PAYMENTS
international.textInfo:
FAST INTERNATIONAL PAYMENTS 
The Bitcoin network is working tirelessly to make sure you’re never waiting on a transfer. You can pay someone on the other side of the world as quickly as you can pay your neighbour, with transfers from Africa to Canada only taking around 10 minutes. There’s no bank, with their snails-pace processes, to slow the whole procedure

fees.heading: ZERO OR LOW FEES
fees.textInfo:
ZERO OR LOW FEES 
Having to pay high transaction fees can be a real pain. The Bitcoin network is completely free, with an option to speed up transaction processes by paying a voluntary fee.

decentralized.heading: OPEN AND FULLY DECENTRALIZED
decentralized.textInfo: Unlike your bank and credit card accounts, Bitcoin isn’t owned by anyone. It’s open-source, with a community of developers maintaining the most popular clients. You’re free to spend and play without worrying about some shady banker dipping his fingers into your winnings.

identity.heading: IDENTITY PROTECTION
identity.textInfo: Criminals are clever and once they have your credit card information they can steal your identity and your money. That’s a thing of the past with Bitcoin. No case sensitive information is required and you can even send a payment without revealing your identity at all.

getStartedWithBlock.heading: Get Started With Bitcoins:
getStartedWithBlock.infoText: So now you know more about Bitcoins, we’re sure you’re wondering how to get started with them. Just follow these simple steps and get playing in no time. Here’s what you have to do.

textBlocks.blockOne: Firstly, you'll need to choose which wallet you want to use for your Bitcoin transactions. Just like real money, you'll need somewhere to keep them. Web wallets are the easiest most convenient to use. There are plenty of online wallet options out there, including .................., ................ or ................
textBlocks.blockTwo:
Once you’ve chosen your wallet, it’s time to actually purchase some Bitcoins. This process is getting easier and easier all the time, with lots of websites helping you to get your hands on the virtual currency.

Many sites let you exchange multiple currencies for Bitcoins. These include ..........., .............. and .............. You can even buy Bitcoins directly from other members in your community by finding them on sites like ...........................com.
textBlocks.blockThree: Once you have your Bitcoins it's time to get spending. You can use them to purchase just about anything, from homes to holidays, cars to coats and of course, our fantastic casino games too.

mainBlock.heading: Payments methods
mainBlock.textInfo: We are proud to be a safe multi-currency online casino. Currently, we accept the following currencies: Euro, US Dollars, Canadian Dollar, Australian Dollar, New Zealand Dollar, Japanese Yen, Renminbi, Polish Złoty, Russian Ruble, Norwegian Krone, Bitcoins, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Dogecoin, Tether and Litecoin.

searchGames.enterGameName: Enter the name of the game.

playSafe.heading: Play Safe
playSafe.firstBlock: Playing with us should always be a fun and positive experience. Unfortunately though, sometimes it can be hard to find the right balance between how much we can spend and how much we want to play.
playSafe.secondBlock: If you fear you may be showing signs of problem gambling and want to take measures to ensure the issue does not escalate, then you can opt to self-exclude yourself from our casino. In order to activate this, or to find out more information on self-exclusion, please contact our support team at

thirdBlock.partOne: If you are concerned for someone close to you, such as a friend or family member, then please get in touch with us right away. Our support team is available via the LiveChat or by email at
thirdBlock.partTwo: They will do everything they can to assist you.

playSafe.fourthBlock: Although we are 100% dedicated to helping you and those you care about, it is always a good idea to speak to independent professional services for assistance with problem gambling.

details.heading: Slot Wars - Terms and Conditions
details.text:
1. Introduction

These terms and conditions and the documents referred to below (the "Terms") apply to the use of the current website (the "Website") and its related or connected services (collectively, the "Service").

You should carefully review these Terms as they contain important information concerning your rights and obligations concerning the use of the Website and form a binding legal agreement between you - our customer (the "Customer"), and us. By using this Website and/or accessing the Service, you, whether you are a guest or a registered user with an account (“Account”), agree to be bound by these Terms, together with any amendments, which may be published from time to time. If you do not accept these Terms, you should refrain from accessing the Service and using the Website.

The Service is owned by 5 for 5 Media N.V. a limited liability company registered in Curacao with company registration number 155513 (0) with registered address at Abrham de Veerstraat 9, Curacao (“Company”), licensed in Curaçao under the Licence t#PENDING issued by Gaming Services Provider N.V. for the provision of online games of chance.

2. General Terms

We reserve the right to revise and amend the Terms (including any documents referred to and linked to below) at any time. You should visit this page periodically to review the Terms and Conditions. Amendments will be binding and effective immediately upon publication on this Website. If you object to any such changes, you must immediately stop using the Service. Your continued use of the Website following such publication will indicate your agreement to be bound by the Terms as amended. Any bets not settled prior to the changed Terms taking effect will be subject to the pre-existing Terms.

twoFaCompleteContainer.enterCurrentAuthCode: Enter current authentication code to complete configuration.

errors.invalidCode: Invalid code entered. Please try again.

textBlock.textOne: We’re always looking out for you!
textBlock.textTwo: 2-factor authentication might sound complicated, but it’s super easy o setup, and will add another layer of security to your acount
textBlock.textThree: Once setup, you’ll have to enter a code when you login to your account, that is being generated in the Google Authenticator app on your phone. So it’s basically a second password, like the code generator you use for online banking, making it nearly impossible for anyone else to access!
textBlock.textFour: If you need any more info. Let us know via Live Chat.

qrBlock.copyCodeText: You can also copy and paste this key into the authentication app:

codeInputBlock.textTwo: Enter current authentication code to complete configuration.

twoFaNOTCompleteContainer.lowerText: Use Google Authenticator on your mobile device. Scan the QR code to start generating two-factor auth codes.

selfExclusionPage.text: Felt the need to be apart from the casino for quite a time? Here you can set the Self-exclusion period for your player account from 24 hours up to 3 years. The setting is applied immediately. During a Self-exclusion period there will be no way for you to get to your account. You neither can edit the Self-exclusion period. Please note! Make sure to request the cashout before Self-exclusion period setting. Once your account is locked you will not be able to request for withdrawal. Upon expiring, your account will be automatically re-activated and you will receive the email notification.
selfExclusionPage.textTwo: If you feel the need in any additional information, please contact support.
selfExclusionPage.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to lock your account? Your account will be locked for selected period. You will not be able to log in to your account and perform any other actions.

firstTextBlock.textListHeading: Documents necessary to speed up your withdrawal:
firstTextBlock.proofIdentity: Proof of Identity: Passport, Driving License or official Government issued ID card. More
firstTextBlock.proofAddress: Proof of Address: Utility bill, phone bill or bank statement displaying your name and address in full. More
firstTextBlock.proofDeposit: Proof of Deposit: Screenshot or photo from online bank, bank statement, Skrill page, etc. showing the deposit. More

secondTextBlock.textHeading: You will also have to submit documents to verify your Deposit and/or Withdrawal methods depending on the chosen method. Please check below information on the methods you have used to find out what you need to send:
secondTextBlock.netellerOrSkrill: If using Neteller or Skrill: Screenshot of profile page on Neteller or Skrill showing profile with postal address visible.
secondTextBlock.creditCard: If using Credit Card: Front and Back of card used to deposit, with digits 8-12 and CVC/CVV covered. More
secondTextBlock.bankWithdrawal: If using Bank withdrawal: Bank statement dated within the last 90 days showing full name and address. More
